itemLabel: Edward Boyle, Baron Boyle of Handsworth

wikipedia_page.main: Edward Charles Gurney Boyle, Baron Boyle of Handsworth,  (31 August 1923 – 28 September 1981) was a British Conservative Party politician and Vice-Chancellor of the University of Leeds.

response: ** Sir Edward Boyle, Baron Boyle of Handsworth, British Conservative cabinet minister (b. 1923)

*Edward Boyle, Baron Boyle of Handsworth (1923–1981), British Conservative Party politician, MP 1950–1970
